description: Watch live as Hibs thrash Inter d'Escaldes of Andorra 6-1 to overturn a first-leg deficit in their Europa Conference League qualifier.
title: Watch: Hibs overwhelm Andorrans to advance in Europa Conference League
title_page: Watch: Hibs overwhelm Andorrans to advance in Europa Conference League - BBC Sport
maintext:
'Hibs were itching to get Boyle back' - Johnson
FT: Hibernian 6-1 Inter Club D'Escaldes (agg 7-3)
Hibs boss Lee Johnson tells BBC Scotland: "I was delighted the crowd got to see new players play well, but also the old guard.
"We've been itching to get [Martin Boyle] back in. He's so dangerous in behind."
On the goalkeeping situation going forward to Sunday's game with St Mirren, Johnson adds: "That one's going to be tricky, we need to assess David and we've got Max Boruc.
"We've got the option of an emergency loan as well."
'I'm young at heart' - Boyle
FT: Hibernian 6-1 Inter Club D'Escaldes (agg 7-3)
Hibs forward Martin Boyle tells BBC Scotland he's "delighted with the victory and the goals" he scored tonight.
"My body feels good," he adds. "I still feel young at heart. Being injured such a long period, you get that hunger again. I've still got that desire.
"Last week was disappointing, but we put it right tonight. You can see our strength in depth."
